==Chinese==
{{zh-forms}}

===Glyph origin===
{{Han etym}}
Significance uncertain. The ancient character is analyzed by some sources as an exhalation of breath, suggesting the completion of an action. {{zh-l|*厶}} (in one of its uses) and {{zh-l|*以}} are ultimately descended from this same character.

===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[stop]]; to [[finish]]
#* {{zh-x|此 水 幾時 休，此 恨 何時 已。|When will the river cease to flow? When will this brooding '''end'''?|ref='''Song Dynasty''', {{w2|zh|李之儀}}, {{lang|zh|《卜算子·我住長江頭》}}}}
# [[already]]; [[have]] [[done]] something
#* {{zh-x|情義 已 失去，恩愛 都 失去|Friendship has '''already''' gone, and all of the love is gone|C-LIT|ref='''1983''', {{w2|zh|陳百強}}, {{w2|zh|pref=《|偏偏喜歡你 (專輯)|偏偏喜歡你|suf=》}}}}
